00015 #ifndef NINJA_BUILD_H_
00016 #define NINJA_BUILD_H_
00017 
00018 #include <set>
00019 #include <string>
00020 #include <queue>
00021 #include <vector>
00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 struct Edge;
00025 struct DiskInterface;
00026 struct Node;
00027 struct State;
00028 
00029 /// Plan stores the state of a build plan: what we intend to build,
00030 /// which steps we're ready to execute.
00031 struct Plan {
00032   Plan();
00033 
00034   /// Add a target to our plan (including all its dependencies).
00035   /// Returns false if we don't need to build this target; may
00036   /// fill in |err| with an error message if there's a problem.
00037   bool AddTarget(Node* node, string* err);
00038 
00039   // Pop a ready edge off the queue of edges to build.
00040   // Returns NULL if there's no work to do.
00041   Edge* FindWork();
00042 
00043   /// Returns true if there's more work to be done.
00044   bool more_to_do() const { return !want_.empty(); }
00045 
00046   /// Dumps the current state of the plan.
00047   void Dump();
00048 
00049   /// Mark an edge as done building.  Used internally and by
00050   /// tests.
00051   void EdgeFinished(Edge* edge);
00052 
00053   /// Number of edges with commands to run.
00054   int command_edge_count() const { return command_edges_; }
00055 
00056 private:
00057   bool AddSubTarget(Node* node, vector<Node*>* stack, string* err);
00058   bool CheckDependencyCycle(Node* node, vector<Node*>* stack, string* err);
00059   void NodeFinished(Node* node);
00060 
00061   set<Edge*> want_;
00062   set<Edge*> ready_;
00063 
00064   /// Total number of edges that have commands (not phony).
00065   int command_edges_;
00066 };
00067 
00068 /// CommandRunner is an interface that wraps running the build
00069 /// subcommands.  This allows tests to abstract out running commands.
00070 /// RealCommandRunner is an implementation that actually runs commands.
00071 struct CommandRunner {
00072   virtual ~CommandRunner() {}
00073   virtual bool CanRunMore() = 0;
00074   virtual bool StartCommand(Edge* edge) = 0;
00075   /// Wait for commands to make progress; return false if there is no
00076   /// progress to be made.
00077   virtual bool WaitForCommands() = 0;
00078   virtual Edge* NextFinishedCommand(bool* success) = 0;
00079 };
00080 
00081 /// Options (e.g. verbosity, parallelism) passed to a build.
00082 struct BuildConfig {
00083   BuildConfig() : verbosity(NORMAL), dry_run(false), parallelism(1) {}
00084 
00085   enum Verbosity {
00086     NORMAL,
00087     QUIET,  // No output -- used when testing.
00088     VERBOSE
00089   };
00090   Verbosity verbosity;
00091   bool dry_run;
00092   int parallelism;
00093 };
00094 
00095 /// Builder wraps the build process: starting commands, updating status.
00096 struct Builder {
00097   Builder(State* state, const BuildConfig& config);
00098 
00099   Node* AddTarget(const string& name, string* err);
00100   bool Build(string* err);
00101 
00102   bool StartEdge(Edge* edge, string* err);
00103   void FinishEdge(Edge* edge);
00104 
00105   State* state_;
00106   Plan plan_;
00107   DiskInterface* disk_interface_;
00108   CommandRunner* command_runner_;
00109   struct BuildStatus* status_;
00110   struct BuildLog* log_;
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif  // NINJA_BUILD_H_
